title: All uses or mix uses may be permitted irrespective of restriction on floor or area, except uses mentioned at Regulation No
clause_text: All uses or mix uses may be permitted irrespective of restriction on floor or area, except uses mentioned at Regulation No.4.8(ii), 4.11(viii, xviii, xxi, xxii, xxxi, xxxvii), 4.21 and like;
section: In this zone, the following uses, mixed uses may be permitted

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
